comment.author: 54759089@N00
comment._content: I dont know if it is yours, but I found this website www.mcusa-archives.org/archives/scannedphotos/mennonite%2...(ix)/

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Yes, that's our Web site!  We're moving our photos from static HTML pages to flickr, in preparation for another move to a digital content management system.  We plan to keep flickr up to date, though, as it enables us to communicate with remote archives users, like you!

comment.author: 54759089@N00
comment._content:
Like I said sometime previously I do YDNA research. My YDNA matches closely with that of Warkentin, Quiring, Wieler, Lowen, Bergen and I found a new match: Brechbuehl.

All closely related in YDNA.
